item.title: Feeling super frustrated! Tried to help ...
item.description: Feeling super frustrated! Tried to help my nephew reinstall Windows 11, but it froze at 11%. I suspect the motherboard and/or BIOS are corrupted. I had to break the news that a repair shop or new motherboard might be needed. Ugh! Tech troubles can be so annoying! ğŸ˜©ğŸ’»
